pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface for the 'Neo4j Bolt' Protocol // Querying, extracting, and processing large-scale network data from Neo4j databases using the 'Neo4j Bolt' https://neo4j.com/docs/bolt/current/bolt/ protocol. This interface supports efficient data retrieval, batch processing for large datasets, and seamless conversion of query results into R data frames, making it ideal for bioinformatics, computational biology, and other graph-based applications.
